Rooms.Name: Dungeon Entrance
Rooms.Description: You are in the entrance of the dungeon. The way out is blocked.

NorthDoor.LockedText: The door is covered with vines. Find something to cut them.

EastDoor.LockedText: The door is on fire. Find something to put it out.

SouthDoor.LockedText: The entrance collapsed. Try to find another way.

WestDoor.LockedText: You are looking at a wall.

Rooms.Name: Prison Cell
Rooms.Description: This room looks like a prison cell. There is something written on the wall.

NorthDoor.LockedText: You are looking at a wall.

EastDoor.LockedText: You are looking at a wall.

SouthDoor.LockedText: You are looking at a wall.

Rooms.Name: Armory
Rooms.Description: This was probably the armory. But most of the weapons are gone.

NorthDoor.LockedText: You are looking at a wall.

EastDoor.LockedText: The is a deep hole in the ground. It is too far for you to jump.

WestDoor.LockedText: You are looking at a wall.

Rooms.Name: Kitchen
Rooms.Description: You have found the kitchen. Maybe you can find food here.

EastDoor.LockedText: You are looking at a wall.

SouthDoor.LockedText: You are looking at a wall.

Rooms.Name: Sleeping Quarters
Rooms.Description: You enter the sleeping quarters. There is someone in the room.

NorthDoor.LockedText: You are looking at a wall.

EastDoor.LockedText: You are looking at a wall.

NPCs.Name: Guardian
NPCs.Text: Say the words and the treasure is yours.

Rooms.Name: Treasury
Rooms.Description: You have found the treasury! There is a treasure chest in the room. It seems to be alive...

NorthDoor.LockedText: You are looking at a wall.

SouthDoor.LockedText: You are looking at a wall.

WestDoor.LockedText: The is sunlight coming through the gaps of the door. This must be the way out.

CurrentRoom.Name: Kitchen
CurrentRoom.Description: You have found the kitchen. Maybe you can find food here.

EastDoor.LockedText: You are looking at a wall.

SouthDoor.LockedText: You are looking at a wall.

Player.GameEndText: You found a way out! Time to return home and tell everybody about your adventure.
